# Code Templates

Reusable templates for common patterns in this platform.

## Shared Templates

| Template | Usage |
|----------|-------|
| [_template_agents.md](./_template_agents.md) | AGENTS.md file for AI agent guidance |
| [_template_readme.md](./_template_readme.md) | README.md file structure |
| [_template_contents.md](./_template_contents.md) | CONTENTS.md file structure |

## Backend Templates

See [backend/README.md](./backend/README.md) for Spring Boot WebFlux templates:

| Template | Usage |
|----------|-------|
| [backend/_template_controller.md](./backend/_template_controller.md) | REST controller with logging and error handling |
| [backend/_template_redis_cache.md](./backend/_template_redis_cache.md) | Redis cache-aside pattern |
| [backend/_template_redis_pubsub.md](./backend/_template_redis_pubsub.md) | Redis pub/sub messaging |
| [backend/_template_postgres_repository.md](./backend/_template_postgres_repository.md) | R2DBC PostgreSQL repository |

## Frontend Templates

See [frontend/README.md](./frontend/README.md) for React + TanStack templates:

| Template | Usage |
|----------|-------|
| [frontend/_template_feature_component.md](./frontend/_template_feature_component.md) | Smart components with data fetching |
| [frontend/_template_ui_component.md](./frontend/_template_ui_component.md) | Presentational components with CVA |
| [frontend/_template_hook.md](./frontend/_template_hook.md) | Custom React hooks |
| [frontend/_template_page.md](./frontend/_template_page.md) | TanStack Router pages |
| [frontend/_template_ladle_story.md](./frontend/_template_ladle_story.md) | Ladle component stories |
| [frontend/_template_vitest.md](./frontend/_template_vitest.md) | Vitest + RTL tests |
